169#define xTraceInternalEventBufferInitialize(puiBuffer, uiSize) ((void)uiSize, puiBuffer != 0 ? TRC_SUCCESS : TRC_FAIL)
170#define xTraceInternalEventBufferAlloc(ppvData, uiSize) ((void)uiSize, ppvData != 0 ? TRC_SUCCESS : TRC_FAIL)
171#define xTraceInternalEventBufferAllocCommit(pvData, uiSize, piBytesWritten)
172#define xTraceInternalEventBufferPush(pvData, uiSize, piBytesWritten) ((void)uiSize, (void)piBytesWritten, pvData != 0 ? TRC_SUCCESS : TRC_FAIL)
173#define xTraceInternalEventBufferTransfer(piBytesWritten) ((void)piBytesWritten, TRC_SUCCESS)
174#define xTraceInternalEventBufferTransferChunk(piBytesWritten, uiChunkSize) ((void)piBytesWritten, (void)uiChunkSize, TRC_SUCCESS)
175#define xTraceInternalEventBufferClear() (void)(TRC_SUCCESS)
176
177#endif /* (TRC_USE_INTERNAL_BUFFER == 1)*/

xTraceInternalEventBufferTransferAll
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferTransferAll(int32_t *piBytesWritten)
Transfers all internal trace event buffer data using the function xTraceStreamPortWriteData(....
xTraceInternalEventBufferAlloc
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferAlloc(uint32_t uiSize, void **ppvData)
Allocates a data slot directly from the internal event buffer.
xTraceInternalEventBufferTransferChunk
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferTransferChunk(int32_t *piBytesWritten)
Transfer internal trace event buffer data through streamport.
xTraceInternalEventBufferPush
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferPush(void *pvData, uint32_t uiSize, int32_t *piBytesWritten)
Pushes data to the internal trace event buffer.
xTraceInternalEventBufferAllocCommit
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferAllocCommit(void *pvData, uint32_t uiSize, int32_t *piBytesWritten)
Commits the last allocated block to the internal event buffer.
xTraceInternalEventBufferClear
traceResult xTraceInternalEventBufferClear(void)
Clears all trace events in the internal trace event buffer.
